CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22, reads: "Refreshment - A birdseye view shows how David Watson, Pepsi-Cola's national representative from New York, and his booth assistant Miss Dorothy Wheeler, were kept busy pouring ice-cold refreshment for thirsty homemakers."
TitMainTitle: Metropolitan Bottling Company of Pittsburgh's Pepsi booth, 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Ammon Center
